name: sammy dishcloth
notes:
this dishcloth pattern uses the single crochet stitch and half double crochet stitch to create a unique textured dishcloth.

a video tutorial for this pattern is available: https://youtu.be/sc88ux6oicy

materials needed:
65 yards of a #4 medium-weight cotton yarn
4.5mm crochet hook

> [subscribe to my newsletter][1] to be notified when new patterns come out

[1]: https://subscribepage.io/mfhzxe
